## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT1G05385](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT1G05385)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>LPA19, Psb27-H1</u>
- **Gene Name:** LOW PSII ACCUMULATION 19
- **Description:**   photosystem II 11 kDa protein-like protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
